description: Datasets from NPG are freely available for querying at [data.nature.com](http://data.nature.com/query "data.nature.com") or for downloading from the [developers.nature.com](http://developers.nature.com/docs/read/linked_data "developers: linked_data") portal (see under the head "[Snapshots](http://developers.nature.com/docs/read/linked_data/linked_data_releases/Snapshots)"). For downloading you may be asked to register but the data is freely available after that. The data is available both as individual datasets and as a complete release distribution.
name: npg
title: Nature Publishing Group
